lever_bia_tcr.description: Protect/expand the line; waived match, multi-year stability

lever_irs_elective_pay.description: Defend against reconciliation repeal; protect Tribal instrumentality access

lever_epa_gap.description: Increase funding; link to climate resilience readiness

lever_usda_wildfire.description: Add match waivers; long-term fuels pathways

lever_hud_ihbg.description: Frame resilient housing as trust responsibility

lever_usbr_watersmart.description: Expand Tribal drought access; lower match

lever_bia_tcr_awards.description: Protect award program; ensure multi-year planning capacity

lever_epa_tribal_air.description: Protect Clean Air Act §105 Tribal funding; link to climate co-benefits

bar_bric_terminated.description: BRIC program terminated April 2025; no FY24/25 cycle; ~$882M unobligated IIJA funds returned to Treasury

bar_cost_share.description: Cost share / match requirements (25-50%) create barriers for under-resourced Tribes

bar_plan_requirement.description: Tribal Hazard Mitigation Plan required for post-disaster funding (Stafford Act § 322)

bar_instrumentality_ambiguity.description: Tribal instrumentality definition for elective pay requires legal clarity

bar_competitive_only.description: Competitive-only programs disadvantage Tribes without grant-writing capacity

bar_eo14225_reform.description: Executive Order 14225 forest management reforms may restructure CWDG eligibility

bar_appropriations_volatility.description: Annual appropriations volatility creates year-to-year uncertainty for Tribal programs

bar_reconciliation_repeal.description: IRA provisions (§6417 Elective Pay) subject to budget reconciliation repeal

bar_iija_sunset.description: IIJA supplemental funding expires end of FY26; no reauthorization bill yet introduced

bar_agency_capacity.description: Tribal set-aside administrative capacity at agencies insufficient for demand

bar_reauthorization_gap.description: NAHASDA reauthorization uncertainty creates long-term program risk

bar_data_sovereignty.description: Federal data reporting requirements conflict with Tribal data sovereignty principles

bar_match_burden.description: Cost-share/match requirements across multiple programs disproportionately burden Tribes
